PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1993-13821993-06-170,  ,  ,  TB,  EIC,  , 
PrecisAmendment to the UNEMPLOYMENT AND INSURANCE REGULATIONS permitting the payment of supplementary allowances to individuals who are referred to training under section 26 of the Act during their waiting period, to assist them in paying some of the additional costs such as travel, dependant care, etc. that they incur while on training, effective June 20, 1993.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1993-0352 Publication Date: 1993-06-30
Attachments
